  • Field Details

    • villagers

      private final List<Human> villagers
      List of villagers

    • deadVillagers

      private final List<Human> deadVillagers
      List of villagers who are dead and should be removed from the villagers list. Used to prevent concurrent modification of the aforementioned list.

    • buildings

      private final List<Building> buildings
      List of buildings present in the village

      Inventory object

      Map where the village exists

      Changeable tick rate until a villager dies from homelessness

    • tempHouseKillCounter

      private int tempHouseKillCounter
      A variable used to remember how many ticks the village has to wait before trying to kill a villager due to his homelessness

  • Constructor Details

    • Village

      public Village(Position position, int teamID, Map parentMap)
      Construct a new village
      Parameters:
      position - Village's position
      teamID - Owner Team ID
      parentMap - Map where the village exists

  • Method Details

    • changeTeam

      private void changeTeam()
      Determine the next owner based on kill counts and change the village's Team ID

    • addHouseOrKill

      private void addHouseOrKill()
      Try to build a new house in the village. If this is not possible and the kill counter expired, kill a villager.

    • simulationTick

      public void simulationTick()
      Perform a single simulation tick. If there is no villagers left, change the owner Team ID. Make a move with all villagers and perform actions of all buildings. Try to add new buildings and remove dead villagers from the list.

    • storeItems

      public void storeItems(Inventory storedInventory)
      Store items from the given inventory in the village's inventory
      Parameters:
      storedInventory - Inventory to append to the village's inventory

    • addBuilding

      private boolean addBuilding(Building.BuildingType buildingType)
      Add a new building of a given type
      Parameters:
      buildingType - Type of building to add
      Returns:
      Whether there was enough resources in the inventory to create a new building

    • getTeamID

      public int getTeamID()
      Get owner Team ID
      Returns:
      Team ID

    • killVillager

      public void killVillager(Human villager, int killerTeamID)
      Kill a villager. Add him to the list of dead villagers in order not to create a concurrent modification condition.
      Parameters:
      villager - Villager to kill
      killerTeamID - Team ID to increment the kill count for

    • getParentMap

      public Map getParentMap()
      Get the map where the village exists
      Returns:
      Parent map

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()
      Get village's position
      Returns:
      Position object

    • getInventory

      public Inventory getInventory()
      Get village's inventory
      Returns:
      Inventory object

    • addVillager

      public void addVillager()
      Create a new villager and add him to the villagers list

      public List<Human> getVillagers()
      Get villagers list
      Returns:
      Villagers list
